description: Baseline prompts for validating the Qwen2.5 Coder FastAPI service inside the Imagination Network.

cases.name: handshake_exact
cases.prompt: You are participating in the Imagination Network acceptance harness. Reply with EXACTLY the phrase: KIN-VALIDATION HANDSHAKE. Do not add punctuation, code fences, or explanations.

cases.name: structured_json_status
cases.prompt: Respond with a minified JSON object describing your state. Use exactly this structure: {"status":"ready","persona":"kin","temperature":0.2}. Do not add whitespace outside the JSON.

cases.name: workflow_summary
cases.prompt: Compose three bullet points beginning with '- ' that summarise the steps for validating the Qwen kin workflow: baseline capture, agent replay, metrics review. End with the sentence 'Validation complete for kin.'.
